      • setOrder

        public void setOrder(int nn)
              throws WrongNumberEntry,
                     TooLargeNumber,
                     java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException
        * Description: allows to modify the order of the square
        Parameters:
        nn - the new square order.
        Throws:
        WrongNumberEntry - the order of the square is even
        TooLargeNumber - the order of the square is very large
        java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException - the order of the square is negative
